name: Ti-Pure™ R-960 Plastics
description: Ti-Pure™ R-960 Plastics is a rutile titanium dioxide pigment manufactured by the chloride process. It is excellent for exterior plastic applications that require outstanding chalking resistance, gloss, tint, and physical property retention. Its surface treatment minimizes potential reactions with polymer resins and additives while continuing to provide the high level of UV radiation protection associated with rutile titanium dioxide.
